entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 06:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
